children.name: and
children.sourceText: You must repent, and cry unto the voice, even until ye shall have faith in Christ, who was taught unto you by Alma, and Amulek, and Zeezrom; and when ye shall do this, the cloud of darkness shall be removed from overshadowing you.

children.name: of
children.sourceText: They do converse with the angels of God.
